name: Bittern Line Ranger (Norwich-Cromer/Sheringham)
description:
BITTERN LINE RANGER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day between the city of Norwich and the coastal towns of Sheringham and Cromer. 
      It is also valid on Coasthopper and Lynx Coastliner bus services for a £3 supplement or £5 for a family and tickets are valid all day. The heritage North Norfolk Railway is located at Sheringham which is just a minute's walk from the main station.
